rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0001
rows.name:
...I shouldn't know
this place, and yet.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0002
rows.name: But why, I wonder?

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0003
rows.name:
There's something catching
in my chest, and I can't
help but be concerned...

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0004
rows.name: Musubi?!

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0005
rows.name: You're Musubi, aren't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0006
rows.name: Hm?

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0007
rows.name: So you've come back!

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0008
rows.name: Father will be happy too!

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0009
rows.name: ...Excuse me, but who are you?

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0011
rows.name:
What's wrong, Musubi?
Don't you recognize us?

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0012
rows.name:
Musubi doesn't have
memories of the past.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0013
rows.name:
Musubi doesn't have memories
of the past, you know.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0014
rows.name:
Musubi lacks all memories
of her former days.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0015
rows.name:
Musubi's forgotten everything
from before, ya know.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0016
rows.name:
I see... So Musubi's memories got
wiped after Daddy passed away...

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0017
rows.name: Then you're her new Driver?

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0018
rows.name:
Yeah, you could say the old
man left her in my care...

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0019
rows.name:
Right, you could say I inherited
her from the old man...

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0020
rows.name: Yes, indeed.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0021
rows.name: Ah, that's right.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0022
rows.name:
It's a relief... that someone
as kind as you is her Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0023
rows.name:
I believe Father would be pleased
that you've become her new Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0024
rows.name: You two are...?

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0025
rows.name: You belong to this household, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0026
rows.name: Did you know me from before?

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0101
rows.name:
This is the house where
our father lived.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0102
rows.name: However, he recently passed away...

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0103
rows.name:
We came back after a long absence
to take care of his affairs.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0104
rows.name: I see. I'm sorry for your loss...

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0105
rows.name: Can I help you with anything?

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0106
rows.name:
No need, your concern alone
is greatly appreciated.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0107
rows.name:
But more importantly, what
brings you to this house?

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0108
rows.name: Well... I can't really explain it, but

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0109
rows.name:
something about this house makes me
feel warm and somehow familiar...

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0110
rows.name: Is that so...

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0111
rows.name:
Whoever resided here must have
been an admirable individual.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0112
rows.name: What makes you say that?

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0113
rows.name:
...It's evident from
observing the two of you.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0114
rows.name:
Anyone who raised such remarkable
children must be exceptional.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0115
rows.name: It's the sure mark of a great person.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0116
rows.name:
...Actually, our father
was just a regular man.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0117
rows.name:
The real great person here
was the one who raised us
after our ma died.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0118
rows.name: Kinder and warmer than our mother.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0119
rows.name: And where is this person now?

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0120
rows.name:
...Taking care of important
business, I hear.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0121
rows.name:
But we hope to meet them
again, once that's done.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0122
rows.name:
When that time comes, I think we'll
properly talk about each other.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0123
rows.name: I see. Well, I think that's good.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0124
rows.name: I'm sure that person will be happy too.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0201
rows.name: Yeah.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0202
rows.name:
You took very good care
of us in the past.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0203
rows.name: I'm truly glad we could meet here.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0204
rows.name: Is that so...

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0205
rows.name:
So before I was resonated
with, I lived here...

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0206
rows.name: Then, who lived in this house?

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0207
rows.name:
It's our father's. However,
he recently passed away...

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0208
rows.name:
...Was your father also
acquainted with me?

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0209
rows.name: Yes, absolutely.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0210
rows.name: Our father relied on you tremendously.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0211
rows.name:
I think he would be very
happy that you came today.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0212
rows.name:
I'm sorry, I have no memories
of that time at all...

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0213
rows.name:
I don't remember any of you
either... I sincerely apologize.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0214
rows.name:
It's alright, Musubi-san.
Please don't worry about it.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0215
rows.name:
Just the fact that you came here
today makes us very happy.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0216
rows.name: I almost forgot! Here, omusubi.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0217
rows.name:
These aren't exactly proper
offerings, but if you don't mind...

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0218
rows.name:
I prepared them fresh this
morning. Please, help yourselves.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0219
rows.name: ...Omusubi...

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0220
rows.name: How nostalgic...

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0221
rows.name:
Though with my lack of memories,
this is all I can do...

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0222
rows.name:
Not at all, it's more than
enough. Thank you very much.

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0223
rows.name:
Excuse me... Might I be permitted
to visit again in the future?

rows.label: kizunatalk073_msg0224
rows.name:
Absolutely. This is as much
your home as it is ours.
